definition[0]: something which someone depends on completely
example[0]: The telephone is her lifeline to the rest of the world.
example[1]: The organization has proved to be a lifeline for thousands of needy families.
definition[1]: a rope used for saving people in danger, especially at sea
definition[2]: something a country, organization etc depends on completely
example[2]: Hawaii has always been able to count on tourism, itseconomic lifeline.
